description:
Perfectly roasted peanuts and creamy 33% milk chocolate, what’s not to love?

  • Ingredients: milk chocolate [sugar, cocoa solids 33%* [pure cocoa butter & cocoa mass], NZ milk powder 17%*, emulsifier (soy lecithin), vanilla flavour]; roasted peanuts 35%. *Minimum percentage
  • Allergens, contains: peanuts and milk, may contain: tree nuts and gluten
  • A family legacy, Whittaker’s is New Zealand’s finest chocolate and has been since 1896
  • Based on rich Ghanian cocoa pods that are sun-dried to perfection before processing in small batches in Porirua New Zealand
  • Rainforest alliance certified
name: Whittaker's Original Peanut Slab
